positive_examples: This is an example of chemical powder.
The chemical powder demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed chemical powder in this context.
A typical case of chemical powder would involve these features.
The concept of chemical powder applies here.
Powdered chemical compounds used in industrial processes, pharmaceuticals, and chemical manufacturing.
negative_examples: This is an example of fallout, not chemical powder.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Fallout, or other types of Powder

definition: A finely divided chemical substance in dry particulate form.
